description: National Programme for Improving Living Conditions: BUILDING CAPACITY FOR POVERTY REDUCTION

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: Strengthened national and civil society capacities to formulate and implement social development strategies particularly the Ministry of Social Affairs
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: CAPACITY BUILDING FOR POVERTY

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description:
This project aims at post-war social recovery through providing support to the Inter-Ministerial Committee on Social Issues to develop a social strategy for the country, eliminate duplication in delivery of social services and improve coordination in the implementation of local development initiatives.
The project will also target the reform process outlined in the Paris III document, through increased efficiency of public sector social interventions, and enhanced coordination among the major stakeholders.
subproject.title: Support to the Social IMC
